db:abstract.db:para: A component that can be turned on or off.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A toggle switch has two states: an on and an off state. The off state is when the on property is set to false.
The ToggleSwitch component is part of the UI Components module.
This documentation is part of the UIComponents example.

db:section.db:title: on : bool
db:section.db:para: Indicates the state of the switch. If false, then the switch is in the off state.

db:section.db:title: toggle()
db:section.db:para: A method to toggle the switch. If the switch is on, the toggling it will turn it off. Toggling a switch in the off position will turn it on.
